data.name: TUTORIAL
data.title: How to Set Up Core Web3 Developer Tools
data.description: Learn how to write a simple web3 script to get the latest block number from the Ethereum mainnet using Alchemy.

data.name: TUTORIAL
data.title: How to Set Up Core Web3 Developer Tools
data.description: Learn how to write a simple web3 script to get the latest block number from the Ethereum mainnet using Alchemy.

course.title: Solidity: Beginner to Intermediate Smart Contracts
course.summary:
So you think you have what it takes to become a CryptoZombie, huh?

This course will teach you how to build a game on Ethereum.

It's designed for beginners to Solidity, but it assumes you have some experience programming in another language (e.g. Javascript).
course.description: Get up to speed with the basics of Solidity.

course.title: Chainlink: Decentralized Oracles
course.summary: Combine the real-world and all of its changes and information with our beloved zombies.
course.description: Combine the real-world and all of its changes and information with our beloved zombies.

course.title: Advanced Solidity: Get In-depth Knowledge
course.summary:
Testing Smart Contracts with Truffle will teach you to:
- Test your smart contracts with Truffle against Ganache
- Use Chai to write more expressive assertions
- Test against Loomüòâ

Deploying Ethereum DApps with Truffle will walk you through the process of deploying your smart contracts with Truffle.
course.description: Deploying Ethereum DApps with Truffle will walk you through the process of deploying your smart contracts with Truffle.

course.title: Beyond Ethereum: Explore the Blockchain Ecosystem
Tron: Decentralize the web
course.summary: Start working with TRON, one of the fastest-growing public blockchains.
course.description: Start working with TRON, one of the fastest-growing public blockchains.
